Package dev.nhuels.eventservice.service

Class EventService

java.lang.Object
dev.nhuels.eventservice.service.EventService
@Service public class EventService extends Object
Service class for the Event entity. This class provides methods for retrieving, saving, updating, and deleting events. It uses the EventRepository, ArtistRepository, and UserRefRepository for database operations and the ModelMapper for converting between entities and DTOs.

    • getEventById

      public EventDetailsDto getEventById(Long id)
      Retrieves an event by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the event to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The EventDetailsDto of the retrieved event.
      Throws:
      EventNotFoundException - If the event does not exist.

    • getAllEvents

      public Set<EventDetailsDto> getAllEvents()
      Retrieves all events.
      Returns:
      A set of EventDetailsDto of all events.

    • createEvent

      @Transactional public Long createEvent(Long creatorId, EventCreateDto eventCreateDto)
      Creates a new event.
      Parameters:
      creatorId - The ID of the user creating the event.
      eventCreateDto - The EventCreateDto containing the details of the event to create.
      Returns:
      The ID of the created event.

    • updateEvent

      @Transactional public void updateEvent(Long eventId, EventCreateDto eventCreateDto)
      Updates an existing event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to update.
      eventCreateDto - The EventCreateDto containing the new details of the event.
      Throws:
      EventNotFoundException - If the event does not exist.

    • deleteEvent

      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to delete.
